item.title: Pure CSS Lightbox in Hugo theme
item.description: from jlelse’s Blog Hugo themes have the option to override the default rendering of Markdown images by using â€œMarkdown Render Hooksâ€ since version 0.62.0. By creating a file in layouts/_default/_markup named render-image.html it is possible to use a custom template for rendered images. This gives a lot of flexibility. I just used that flexibility to create a lightbox with pure CSS (without using JavaScript, like many lightbox implementations do).
